entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the main character who took on a full-grown mountain troll. He wins Gryffindor five points.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as Harry's friend and companion in taking down the troll. He also grumbled about not getting more points.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being locked in with the troll, but ultimately saved by Harry and Ron.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as awarding Gryffindor five points to Harry and Ron.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as being informed of the incident by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that Harry and Ron are a part of, and they win five points for it.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is mentioned as the portrait that guards the entrance to Gryffindor common room.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends who work together to take down the troll.
Harry rescues Hermione from being locked in with the troll.
Ron also acknowledges that Harry and he saved Hermione.
Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
Ron is also a member of Gryffindor house.
